issue.title: amputee-girl.blogspot.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

F

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

G

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard DNS filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Website `https://amputee-girl.blogspot.com/2020/08/amputee-girl-her-new-car-was-specially.html` immediately redirects to some malicious websites.

Very suspicious website. Can you block it if necessary?

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: DuckDuckGo tracker
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Content Blocker

### AdGuard version

T

### What type of problem have you encountered?

AdGuard gets detected on a website

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

T

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Dutch filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Hello! The analytics on the DuckDuckGo service. Please add to the list of link reductions from tracking parameters

Example:
`https://duckduckgo.com/?q=anything&t=iphone&iax=images&ia=images`

So can you add the following rule:
`||duckduckgo.com^$removeparam=t`

Everything works fine without this parameter. I had checked

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Unfortunately, we cannot reproduce the issue with your settings.

Please try checking the filters updates, maybe it was already solved. If you’re still able to reproduce the issue, reopen it here. We’d appreciate if you supply additional information or screenshots.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F) ### Comment > Youtube'da solda bulunan ayrılmış menü penceresi normalde ana ekranı takip edip aşağı ana ekranla birlikte değişmeden gelmesi lazım fakat Adguard etkinken sol menü penceresi yukarıda kalıyor ve ana bölümü takip etmiyor. comment.body:
Hello @Lion-hk

This site has too low traffic, and according to our filtering policy we only add rules for sites with more than 100,000 visits per month.
![1232647468nk](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/18536328/226494388-e32e076b-8f09-4d6f-9437-b4017adb3706.png)

Please use these rules in your user rules:

```
bdys03.com#%#//scriptlet("adjust-setInterval", "_0x", "", "0.02")
bdys03.com#%#//scriptlet("set-constant", "alert", "noopFunc")
```
